name: Diffusion Cards
description:
A game of chance created for the 2022 Epic MegaJam with the theme "As Above So Below" reflected in the mechanics and the artwork.

Gameplay:

  • There are 50 cards in total
  • Values range from 1 to 10 
  • Bet on the value of the next card: Will it be above or below the current card?
  • Note: If it's the same value, you always lose 
  • Card art is themed as "above" and "below"
  • All card art was created using a guided text to image AI called Stable Diffusion

Sourced assets created before the jam:

  • All sounds
  • The table mesh
  • The purple Niagara effect
